Topic.Title: Quick question on our latest Gamebook game

Posts.EditableText: So, aside from it being ridiculously short, even for a demo, would you guys like each story to be published individually (by this I mean we could write each story one by one and then disable the links to the other stories by temporarily removing the link text) and then work on the next story while you guys play the available story and then we publish each story as we finish it (this would be the easiest way for us but we can do either way) Or would you rather us just release them all together?(this would take a lot more time and it would take longer to publish the game, leaving you guys to play our crapy demo that much longer)
Posts.HTML: So, aside from it being ridiculously short, even for a demo, would you guys like each story to be published individually (by this I mean we could write each story one by one and then disable the links to the other stories by temporarily removing the link text) and then work on the next story while you guys play the available story and then we publish each story as we finish it (this would be the easiest way for us but we can do either way) Or would you rather us just release them all together?(this would take a lot more time and it would take longer to publish the game, leaving you guys to play our crapy demo that much longer)
